wikipedia_page.main: Lt. Col. Richard John Vulliamy Battle MBE, FRCS, LRCP, MCh Cantab, MA Cantab, BA Cantab, 1970 Gillies Gold Medal. (21 January 1907 – 26 May 1982) was an English plastic surgeon.

response: *Richard Battle – plastic surgeon"Battle, Richard John Vulliamy" in Who Was Who 1897-2006, from Battle, Richard John Vulliamy (accessed 22 August 2007)

Battle was the third son and sixth of the nineteen children of John Richard Battle, of Potter Hanworth and Rebecca Scoley, his wife. His father held a good position in Lincoln, where he was an alderman and served as mayor of the city.
